citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
04/22/2015.
Inspector honked the horn, knocked on door, waited in driveway for 30 minutes and called. Representative stated
they were out of town and said when they would return.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
04/22/2015.  
Inspector honked the horn, knocked on door, waited in driveway for 30 minutes and called.  Representative stated
they were out of town and said when they would return.
